resources.string: This story was written by Lizzie, M. Ed.
A Sweet Adventure with Forest Friends!!!

The summer sun is shining and our cute friends Panda, Fox, Rabbit and Teddy Bear are off on a brand new adventure deep in the jungle! In this book, children learn patience with Panda, clever thinking with Fox, friendly sharing with Rabbit and brave steps with Teddy Bear. Filled with colorful illustrations, warm stories and sweet characters, this book offers young readers valuable life lessons in a fun way.
